title: See photos of Trump's visit to 'Alligator Alcatraz'
shortDescription: On Tuesday, July 1, President Donald Trump toured a remote migrant detention center dubbed “Alligator Alcatraz."

title: Senate passes President Trump's policy bill
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's amended bill was narrowly passed by the Senate, with Vice President JD Vance's vote breaking the 50-50 tie.

title: Vance: Medicaid cuts in tax bill 'immaterial' compared to ICE increase
shortDescription: Vice President JD Vance said cuts to Medicaid and budget impacts in the Senate tax bill don't compare to the importance of ICE spending.

title: Frustrated House Republicans prepare to tackle Trump's tax bill
shortDescription: A handful of key House Republicans have already indicated they have frustrations with the Senate-passed bill.

title: Trump's big bill is a win. But it could also be a big problem for GOP
shortDescription: A Republican senator who was slammed by Trump after opposing his bill won't seek reelection. Another said the bill is testing the "soul" of the GOP.

title: NOAA budget mirrors Trump plan, reduces spending and staff
shortDescription: A detailed expense budget for NOAA outlines plans to reduce spending and cut climate and atmospheric research.

title: Which Senate Republicans voted against Trump's tax and spending bill?
shortDescription: GOP Sens. Rand Paul of Kentucky and Thom Tillis of North Carolina earlier voted no but the surprise was Susan Collins of Maine also opposed it.

title: Trump jabs Biden on Alligator Alcatraz tour
shortDescription: President Donald Trump took shots at former President Joe Biden's immigration policies during his tour of Alligator Alcatraz.

title: Senate gives Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' a thumbs up: 5 takeaways
shortDescription: Republican infighting defined a caustic debate that saw significant opposition to Medicaid cuts, which could define the 2026 midterm elections

title: Trump tours 'Alligator Alcatraz' immigration detention center
shortDescription: President Trump visited a migrant detention center in a reptile-infested Florida swamp dubbed "Alligator Alcatraz" on July 1, 2025.

title: How do Americans feel about Trump on immigration? What recent polls show
shortDescription: As the administration touts the unopened migrant detention center, polls show Americans' sentiments about immigration and deportations.

title: Trump unveils new 'Victory' fragrances for men, women
shortDescription: "Victory 45-47" is available for men and women. One bottle cost $249.

title: Trump predicts 'a lot of fun' with Mamdani if he's elected NYC mayor
shortDescription: President Trump lashed out at Zohran Mamdani, the New York City Democratic nominee for mayor, as a "communist" and a "total nut job."

title: Trump visits 'Alligator Alcatraz' in Florida
shortDescription: President Donald Trump visited a new migrant detention center, dubbed "Alligator Alcatraz," in Florida.

title: Iran-linked hackers threaten to release Trump aides' emails
shortDescription: In online chats with Reuters the hackers said they had emails from the accounts of several people connected to Trump.

title: Trump discusses possibility of Musk deportation
shortDescription: Donald Trump addressed whether or not he'd have Elon Musk deported as the former DOGE head continues to criticize the president's sweeping spending bill.

title: President Trump takes a trip to visit 'Alligator Alcatraz'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is visiting "Alligator Alcatraz" on Tuesday, July 1. Here's what to know about the trip and the detention center in Florida.

title: Trump says he'll look at deporting Elon Musk as feud reignites
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he will 'have to take a look' at deporting Elon Musk to his native South Africa as their fight reached new heights.

title: Trump's big bill passes Senate; House battle is next: Live updates
shortDescription: Vice President JD Vance provided the tie-breaking vote to get Trump's bill across the finish line. It now must go back to the House for approval.

title: Elon Musk threatens lawmakers who vote for bill
shortDescription: Elon Musk took to X to threaten any lawmakers who vote for President Donald Trump's sweeping spending bill.

title: Senator Thom Tillis won't seek reelection after opposing Trump's bill
shortDescription: Republican Senator Thom Tillis of North Carolina has announced he won't run for reelection in 2026, a day after voting against Trump's budget bill.

title: Trump expected at ‘Alligator Alcatraz’ opening
shortDescription: Florida’s new immigration detention center in the Everglades is expected to open with President Donald Trump likely in attendance.

title: Elon Musk threatens Republican leaders set to pass Trump's bill
shortDescription: As the Senate prepares to vote on Donald Trump’s tax and budget bill, Elon Musk vows to back primary challenges against Republicans who support it.

title: Daily Briefing: Capitol Hill all-nighter
shortDescription: Senators stayed up all night hashing out a major tax bill. Here is the news to know on Tuesday.

title: Trump's major tax, Medicaid bill nears Senate finish line
shortDescription: Debates on and off the floor stretched through the night June 30 and continued on past sunrise July 1.

title: Trump enforces statutory ban on US tourism to Cuba
shortDescription: The directive will enforce a statutory ban on U.S. tourism to Cuba while supporting an economic embargo of the country, the White House said.

title: Former Rep. Colin Allred launches 2026 campaign for US Senate
shortDescription: Colin Allred is the first notable Democratic candidate in a Senate race that is likely to garner national attention and funding.
